Posts.Content: Jan 21, 2013 03:01AM france wrote: I was diagnosed stage 4 in September 2011. Lymph node and liver mets. Had a double mastectomy. I had chemo that was successful - no detectable cancer (even in my liver!). I take herceptin and will continue for years. Always concerned about recurrences as I am still considered stage 4. Has anyone tried anything like full body hyperthermia (in Europe). Or at the very least supplements like curcumin? france
Posts.Title: Expected Life SPAMgirl jocanuck1951
